input:
The normal respiratory rate for an adult male is:

A) 20-22 breaths per minute.
B) 24-26 breaths per minute.
C) 26-28 breaths per minute.
D) 14-16 breaths per minute.
E) 12-14 breaths per minute.
F) 10-12 breaths per minute.
G) 22-24 breaths per minute.
H) 8-10 breaths per minute.
I) 16-18 breaths per minute.
J) 18-20 breaths per minute.
finalAnswer:
D (14-16 breaths per minute), with a contextual note:
"The normal respiratory rate for an adult male can vary depending on the individual's activity level, fitness status, and underlying medical conditions. However, as a general guideline, a rate of 14-16 breaths per minute is considered to be within the normal range."

The normal respiratory rate for an adult male is:

A) 20-22 breaths per minute.
B) 24-26 breaths per minute.
C) 26-28 breaths per minute.
D) 14-16 breaths per minute.
E) 12-14 breaths per minute.
F) 10-12 breaths per minute.
G) 22-24 breaths per minute.
H) 8-10 breaths per minute.
I) 16-18 breaths per minute.
J) 18-20 breaths per minute.
